name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】一番星の推し[あなた]へ届ける⇒ 『LETTER☆彡』【#白上フブキ生誕祭2023】 [7995orE5Enc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki takes a short break to drink water and introduces the next song to the audience.
Shirakami Fubuki performs the high-energy song 'Hi Fine FOX!!' on stage with dynamic visual effects and backup dancers on the screen.

subtitles.original: お、えーのみつついこうと思いますが、
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm thinking of continuing while drinking, but...

subtitles.original: えーちょっとお水飲むか。よいしょ。
subtitles.english: Let me take a quick sip of water. Up we go.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲いきましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, let's move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: 次の曲は、皆さん、
subtitles.english: For the next song, everyone...

subtitles.original: もちろんこれとかも覚えてますよね？
subtitles.english: You all remember this gesture, right?

subtitles.original: Hi Fine FOX!! です！
subtitles.english: It's "Hi Fine FOX!!"!

subtitles.original: いっぱいサイリウム振ってね！
subtitles.english: Wave your lightsticks a lot!

subtitles.original: Hi Fine FOX!!
subtitles.english: Hi Fine FOX!!

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：ハム
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Hamu

subtitles.original: こんこんきーつね！
subtitles.english: Kon kon kitsune!

subtitles.original: 私は白上フブキです！
subtitles.english: I'm Shirakami Fubuki!

subtitles.original: お歌とお茶とゲームが大好き、オタクなバーチャル狐です！
subtitles.english: I love singing, tea, and gaming—I'm an otaku virtual fox!

subtitles.original: いろんなことして毎日楽しく活動してるので、
subtitles.english: I do all sorts of things and have fun every day,

subtitles.original: フブちゃん、フブキ、白上、皆さんお好きに呼んでください！
subtitles.english: Fubu-chan, Fubuki, Shirakami—call me whatever you like!

subtitles.original: 今日がはじめてのひとも
subtitles.english: Even those of you here for the first time,

subtitles.original: いつも見てくれてるひとも
subtitles.english: And those of you who always watch me,

subtitles.original: 一人一人のチカラで
subtitles.english: Through the strength of each and every one of you,

subtitles.original: 私はここにいます
subtitles.english: I am standing right here.

subtitles.original: そう 今も
subtitles.english: Yes, even now,

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Always,

subtitles.original: 変わらないこの場所で
subtitles.english: In this unchanging place,

subtitles.original: キミもいつだって推したって Welcome Friends!!
subtitles.english: Supporting you, whenever, whoever—Welcome Friends!!

subtitles.original: まだまだ道の途中
subtitles.english: We're still only halfway there,

subtitles.original: 慌ただしく過ぎる日々は
subtitles.english: The days passing by in such a rush

subtitles.original: 宝物ですよ
subtitles.english: Are true treasures, you know.

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょげたって大丈夫じゃい！
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry or feel down!

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に Hi Fine FOX!!
subtitles.english: Together with a smile, Hi Fine FOX!!

subtitles.original: ココロを歌に重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering my heart into the song,

subtitles.original: 届けましょう My Happy Days
subtitles.english: Let's deliver these Happy Days.

subtitles.original: はーじまーぼーう！
subtitles.english: Hajiman bou!

subtitles.original: 今日は何をして遊びましょうか？
subtitles.english: What shall we play at today?

subtitles.original: お茶でも飲んで一息〜って
subtitles.english: Let's take a breather with some tea—

subtitles.original: もうこんな時間！？
subtitles.english: Is it that time already!?

subtitles.original: 皆さんのことをもーっと知れたら私も幸せなので、
subtitles.english: It would make me so happy to get to know you all better,

subtitles.original: 釣ったり狩ったりアピールしたり、皆さんせーのでご一緒に！
subtitles.english: Fishing, hunting, and showing off—everyone, let's go together!

subtitles.original: 楽しくて飛び跳ねる日も
subtitles.english: On days we jump around with joy,

subtitles.original: 悲しくて落ち込める日も
subtitles.english: And on days we're down and out,

subtitles.original: 皆さんの傍でちょこんと
subtitles.english: I'll be right there by your side,

subtitles.original: 私がここにいます
subtitles.english: Right here for you.

subtitles.original: そう 今も
subtitles.english: Yes, even now,

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Always,

subtitles.original: 変わらない想いだから
subtitles.english: Because these feelings won't change,

subtitles.original: キミと誰だって推したって Welcome Friends!!
subtitles.english: With you, supporting anyone—Welcome Friends!!

subtitles.original: ますます成長中
subtitles.english: Still growing more and more,

subtitles.original: 同じ時を過ごす今が
subtitles.english: Spending this time together right now

subtitles.original: 幸せなんですよ
subtitles.english: Is such a happy thing, you know.

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょげたって大丈夫じゃい！
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry or feel down!

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に Hi Fine FOX!!
subtitles.english: Together with a smile, Hi Fine FOX!!

subtitles.original: 輝く色を重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering brilliant colors,

subtitles.original: 広げましょう My Brand New World
subtitles.english: Let's expand this Brand New World.

subtitles.original: お空を飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Soaring past the sky,

subtitles.original: 世界を回ったら
subtitles.english: Traveling around the world,

subtitles.original: 宇宙の果てまでも
subtitles.english: Even to the ends of the universe,

subtitles.original: ココロ通わせよう
subtitles.english: Let our hearts connect.

subtitles.original: どこだって届けるよ
subtitles.english: I'll reach you anywhere,

subtitles.original: いつだって願ってるよ
subtitles.english: I'm always wishing for it,

subtitles.original: 誰だって繋がるよ
subtitles.english: Connecting with everyone,

subtitles.original: ここから始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start from here.

subtitles.original: 声をあわせて、一緒にせーの！
subtitles.english: Lend me your voices, all together now!

subtitles.original: 白上の歌、皆さんに届け〜！
subtitles.english: Shirakami's song, let it reach you all!

subtitles.original: Eins! Zwei! Drei! Fox!!
subtitles.english: Eins! Zwei! Drei! Fox!!

subtitles.original: 推して推されて、おにーさんもおねーさんも！
subtitles.english: Supporting and being supported, brothers and sisters too!

subtitles.original: One! Two! Three! Fox!!
subtitles.english: One! Two! Three! Fox!!

subtitles.original: ここまでよくできました！
subtitles.english: You all did so well up to here!

subtitles.original: 最後にひとつ！ 3000回でも足りないぞ！ 100万回愛してる！
subtitles.english: One last thing! 3,000 times isn't enough! I love you a million times!

subtitles.original: これまでを支えてくれた
subtitles.english: To everyone who has supported me until now,

subtitles.original: 皆さんに寄り添いたいなって
subtitles.english: I want to be close to you all.

subtitles.original: 大切な仲間達とこれからも
subtitles.english: With my precious friends, from now on too,

subtitles.original: 今もずっと 大好きなこの場所で
subtitles.english: Always, in this place that I love so much.

subtitles.original: キミもいつだって推したって Welcome Friends!!
subtitles.english: Supporting you, whenever, whoever—Welcome Friends!!

subtitles.original: わくわく更新中
subtitles.english: Excitement constantly updating,

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ明日も未来も
subtitles.english: For the unseen tomorrow and future,

subtitles.original: お友達ですよ
subtitles.english: We're friends, you know.

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょげたって大好きじゃい！
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry or feel down, I still love you!

subtitles.original: 笑顔で一緒に Hi Fine FOX!!
subtitles.english: Together with a smile, Hi Fine FOX!!

subtitles.original: ココロを歌に重ねて
subtitles.english: Layering my heart into the song,

subtitles.original: 届けましょう My Happy Days
subtitles.english: Let's deliver these Happy Days.

subtitles.original: 繋ぎましょう Your Shiny Smile
subtitles.english: Let's connect your Shiny Smile.
